channel.title: Yell shows on certain players
channel.description:
Hello,
I really need some help with something fairly small. It's a ::yell command but I want it so that when i make a yell, it only shows up on staff (rights 1+) screens.
Is this possible? If so, please could I have some help. I don't want to be spoonfed plx, i just want some hints and how to create it.
Thanks

item.title: Yell shows on certain players
item.dc:creator: @jaspertjeoo jaspertjeoo
item.description:
@jaspertjeoo wrote:

[quote=“Mod Dobbs, post:6, topic:391785”]Maike61!!! omfg!

i need to pm you plz[/quote]
than just pm him -giggles-

Read full topic

item.title: Yell shows on certain players
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[Moderator] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Administrator] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[OWNER] "; } yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }
Of course you can always add the donor by adding

if (donator == 1) { titles = "[Donor] "; }
You’ll also need too declare

Read full topic

item.title: Yell shows on certain players
item.dc:creator: @mashamaru mashamaru
item.description:
@mashamaru wrote:

So then he uses this

Insert Quote if (command.startsWith("yell2") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { String titles = ""; if (donator == 1) { titles = "[Donator] "; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[Moderator] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Administrator] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[OWNER] "; } if (playerRights == 4) { titles = "[Player]"; } if (playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Player] "; } yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }

Read full topic

Only OTHER mods+ can see it, no normal players.

item.title: Yell shows on certain players
item.dc:creator: @mashamaru mashamaru
item.description:
@mashamaru wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
                String titles = "";
                if (donator == 1) {
                    titles = "[Donator] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 1) {
                    titles = "[Moderator] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 2) {
                    titles = "[Administrator] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 3) {
                    titles = "[OWNER] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 4) {
                    titles = "[Player]";
                }
                if (playerRights == 0) {
                    titles = "[Player] ";
                }
                                    yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                        + command.substring(5));
        }

fixed just had to change the begging player rights

Read full topic

item.title: Yell shows on certain players
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Dobbs Mod Dobbs
item.description:
@Mod_Dobbs wrote:

No,

thanks for the code, but i was looking for something like this:

when the member of staff uses say ::yell2 the message only shows to members of staff (rights 1+)

Cheers

Read full topic

item.title: Yell shows on certain players
item.dc:creator: @mashamaru mashamaru
item.description:
@mashamaru wrote:

use this code:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { String titles = ""; if (donator == 1) { titles = "[Donator] "; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[Moderator] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Administrator] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[OWNER] "; } if (playerRights == 4) { titles = "[Player]"; } if (playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Player] "; } yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }

Read full topic
